summary: White-Gold retexture for the vanilla Glass Bow
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Description[/b][/u]

This is a simple retexture of the Glass Bow to something more striking (in my opinion). Reworked the diffuse, normal and environment mask maps. It comes in 2k or 1k resolution variants. Check out the screenshots on the images tab for a preview of the textures in game
[u][b]
Compatibility:
[/b][/u]
Should be compatible with pretty much anything that doesn't modify the vanilla glass bow textures. To my knowledge no such mods exist
[u][b]
Requirements:
[/b][/u]
A legit copy of Skyrim. DLCs are not required.
[u][b]
Installation:[/b][/u]

1) Download the file of your choice
2) Install via your favorite mod manager. Or extract the contents to your data folder

[u][b]Uninstallation:[/b][/u]

Uninstall via your mod manager or, if you installed manually, the files you want are located in:

[i]Data/textures/weapons/glass/glassbow.dds
Data/textures/weapons/glass/glassbow_envmask.dds
Data/textures/weapons/glass/glassbow_n.dds[/i]

Just delete them all and you're done!

[u][b]Resources Used:

[/b][/u]GIMP

[u][b]My Other Mods:

[/b][/u][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72472/?]Heater Shield Standalone[/url][/size][/font][u][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72472/?]
[/url][/b][/u]
[u][b]Permissions:

[/b][/u]Although this is a simple retexture, it is also my own hard work. So, I'd appreciate it if whoever wishes to use this mod contact me first
author: revan1988
